mapper.select: select card_id as cardId, card_company_id as cardCompanyName, card_number as cardNumber, card_nickname as cardNickName from registered_card where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into registered_card(reg_card_id, member_id, card_company_id, card_number, card_nickname) values(#{cardId}, #{memberId}, #{cardCompanyId}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardNickName})
